{"step_by_step_thinking": "Ritonavir is known to inhibit the metabolism of drugs that are substrates of the CYP3A4 enzyme. To determine which drugs are not affected by ritonavir, we need to identify drugs that are not metabolized by CYP3A4. Looking at the provided options, phenytoin is primarily metabolized by CYP2C9 and CYP2C19, not CYP3A4. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Phenytoin.", "answer_choice": "B"}
